info.name: Connectly API
info.description:
Full API test collection for the Connectly Project with User Interactions (Likes & Comments).

FEATURES:
- User Authentication
- Post Management (Factory Pattern)
- Comments with validation
- Likes/Unlikes with duplicate prevention
- Paginated comment retrieval
- Real-time like/comment counts

SETUP:
1. Start HTTPS server: `python manage.py runserver_plus --cert-file cert.pem --key-file key.pem`
2. Token is already configured: 862bff975353833c417ef008836d063aab3f9f30
3. In Postman Settings → General → DISABLE 'SSL certificate verification'
4. Import this collection and test!

IMPORTANT: SSL verification MUST be disabled for self-signed certificates.

See LIKES_COMMENTS_API.md for detailed documentation.
